pages.text: $(li)When the $(l)Ender Dragon$() summoned by the use of a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/end_crystal)End Crystal$(/l) on the $(l:patchouli:structures/end_fountain)End Fountain$(/l) is killed, it will drop this item.$(br)$(li)You can place it with a $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytra$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) to make a copy of it.
$(li)The cloned Elytra will be dyed black, but can still be dyed again to another color placing the Elytra in a Crafting Table with the desired dye color.
